md:
giải nghĩa từ "advertisements" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Advertisements (n) - Quảng cáo (noun)

Meaning: Messages or notices that are paid for by an organization or company to promote a product, service, or idea.

Example sentence: The company spent a lot of money on advertisements to promote their new product.

Related words: advertise, advertising, advert, promotional, commercial

Synonyms: commercials, promotions, publicity, announcements

Note: Advertisements can be in various forms such as print ads, online ads, TV commercials, radio ads, etc.
